name: Source My Car Limited
tag_list: buying-a-used-car, second-hand-car-dealers-essex, second-hand-cars-online, used-car-buyers-checklist, used-car-buyers-guide, used-car-dealers, used-cars-for-sale-essex, used-cars-online, uk
overview:
Source My Car is a one stop destination for buying and selling used cars. Source My Car was founded to simplify the plight of potential buyers who had to scan websites after websites online or filter the local newspapers in search of second hand cars in the UK. To save time and money, we have introduced an online tool wherein, the used car buyer can put his specifications in terms of age, colour, model etc. in an automated online form which will be published on board and will be viewed by used car dealers across the nation. On finding a match, the used car dealer in your locality will contact you and approach you to see, or for a test drive. With Source My Car, buyers can enjoy a free subscription and an easy getaway to the car of their choice.

This innovative business model is unique to the used car market. Both buyers and sellers of used cars in Essex can now reap the benefits of an effective search. Used car dealers in Essex are entitled to a two month free trial on signing up with Source My Car. Car dealers can save significantly on advertising and marketing costs by having an access to the list of used car buyers in their area. Source My Car brings potential buyers to your door and vice versa.

Source My Car is a simple and quick way to have your dream car.
